---
title: "Monitoring Workflow"
---

## End-to-End Monitoring Workflow

```{mermaid}
flowchart LR
  A[Pre-Visit Preparation] --> B[On-Site / Remote Monitoring]
  B --> C[Issue Identification]
  C --> D[Follow-Up Letter]
  D --> E[Issue Resolution]
  E --> F[Documentation Complete]
```

## Pre-Visit Preparation
- Review protocol and amendments
- Review prior visit reports
- Identify outstanding issues
- Review EDC listings and queries

## On-Site / Remote Monitoring
- Informed consent review
- SDV per monitoring plan
- Safety review (AEs / SAEs)
- IP accountability
- Facility and staff assessment

## Post-Visit Activities
- Draft Monitoring Visit Report (MVR)
- Issue Follow-Up Letter
- Track action items to resolution
